messages.content: ESTP has Se Hero, which makes them action-oriented and present-focused.
ESTP has Ti Hero which gives them logical analysis skills.
Ti Hero types are ISTP and INTP. These are the thinking types with logic as their primary function.
INTJ's shadow is ENFP, which represents their unconscious fears.
ESTP is a Guardian, focused on duty and responsibility.
ISTP has Ti Hero and Se Parent. They are logical craftsmen who love working with their hands.
The INTJ Ni Hero gives them strong future vision, while Te Parent helps them organize and execute their plans efficiently.
ENFJ's shadow is INFP. This represents the unconscious side of the ENFJ.
